common.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
common.confirm_promote: Are you sure you want to promote this correction to the Knowledge Base?

auth.title: Login to your account
auth.desc_default: Enter your email below to login to your account
auth.desc_2fa: Enter the code from your authenticator app
auth.password_expired: Your password has expired. Please change it.

finops.title: FinOps Monitoring
finops.description: Monitor AI token consumption and estimated costs.
finops.cost_by_model_desc: Distribution of costs across different LLMs
finops.usage_history_desc: Recent AI interactions and their consumption

profile.title: Profile & Settings
profile.desc: Manage your account settings and security preferences.
profile.change_password_desc: Change your password to keep your account secure.
profile.exp_desc: Your password must be changed every 90 days.
profile.2fa_desc: Add an extra layer of security to your account.
profile.dialog_enable_desc: Scan the QR code with your authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Microsoft Authenticator, etc.) and enter the verification code below.
profile.dialog_disable_desc: Are you sure you want to disable 2FA? This will make your account less secure. Please enter your password to confirm.
profile.recovery_desc: Store these codes safely. They are the only way to access your account if you lose your authenticator device.

toast.2fa_mandatory: Two-factor authentication is mandatory and cannot be disabled.

data_sources.title: Data Sources
data_sources.name: Name
data_sources.delete_confirm_desc: This action cannot be undone. All associated queries might fail.

query_tasks.title: Query Tasks
query_tasks.desc: Configure and manage your query tasks
query_tasks.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this task?
query_tasks.store_results_desc: If enabled, a snapshot (first 50 rows) of the result will be saved in history. Keep disabled for sensitive data.
query_tasks.ai_optimization_desc: Analysis provided by the AI model
query_tasks.select_datasource_hint: Please select a data source to start editing

history.title: Execution History
history.desc: Audit logs for all queries executed on the platform
history.snapshot_note: * Stored history is limited to the first 50 rows.

users.title: User Management
users.desc: Manage platform users and their roles
users.edit_desc: Update user information and assign roles.
users.disabled_desc: Disabled users will not be able to log in to the platform.
users.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete user {name}?

roles.title: Role Management
roles.desc: Define roles and their associated permissions
roles.config_desc: Configure the role name and permissions.
roles.can_edit_desc: e.g. Can edit tasks but not data sources

menus.title: Menu Management
menus.delete_confirm: Are you sure? This will delete the menu and all its children.

settings.title: System Settings
settings.ai_desc: LLM models and AI capability configuration
settings.ai_skills_desc: Enable or disable specific Agent capability modules.

keys.platform_name_desc: The name displayed in the sidebar and title.
keys.require_2fa_desc: Enforce Two-Factor Authentication for all users.
keys.system_timezone_desc: Overrides the server timezone for scheduled tasks and logs (e.g. Asia/Shanghai).
keys.show_watermark_desc: Display a watermark with user information on all pages.
keys.query_timeout_ms_desc: Maximum time a query is allowed to run.
keys.allow_export_desc: Whether users can download query results as CSV/Excel.
keys.ai_chat_model_desc: Default model for analysis and SQL generation (e.g., gpt-4o).
keys.ai_embedding_model_desc: Model name for text embeddings (e.g. embedding-3)
keys.ai_timeout_sec_desc: Maximum duration in seconds for AI models to respond (Default: 600s)
keys.ai_base_url_desc: The Base URL for the Model API (e.g., https://api.deepseek.com/v1/)
keys.ai_api_key_desc: API Key for accessing generic OpenAI-protocol models.
keys.ai_key_missing: AI API Key is missing. AI features are disabled.
keys.ai_skill_discovery_desc: Allows the AI to explore database tables, retrieve schemas, and sample data.
keys.ai_skill_security_desc: Enables SQL validation, security redline enforcement, and performance auditing.
keys.ai_skill_core_desc: Maintains contextual memory, handles intent clarification, and submits final solutions.
keys.ai_skill_lucene_desc: Enable Elasticsearch search, index exploration and Lucene query generation (LuceneSkill).

api_keys.title: API Access Management
api_keys.desc: Manage API keys and view integration documentation.
api_keys.keys_card_desc: Generate and manage long-lived access tokens for external systems.
api_keys.auth_desc: All API requests must include the {header} header with your API Key:

endpoints.list_desc: Retrieve a paginated list of available query tasks.
endpoints.execute_desc: Run a specific query task with parameters.
endpoints.logs_desc: Fetch audit logs of executed queries.

api_keys.revoke_confirm: Are you sure you want to revoke this key? Any scripts using it will stop working immediately.
api_keys.dialog_create_desc: Give your key a name to identify it later (e.g., "CICD Pipeline", "Reporting Script").
api_keys.expiration_hint: Keys will automatically stop working after expiration.
api_keys.dialog_token_desc: Make sure to copy your API key now. You won't be able to see it again!

security_tools.title: Security Tools
security_tools.helper_hint: Input can be the raw ciphertext or a JSON object containing a "data" field.

knowledge_base.title: Knowledge Base
knowledge_base.desc: Human-in-the-Loop: Review and manage AI-learned knowledge.

dialog.desc: Add a business term and its definition to help the AI understand your domain.

toast.load_failed: Failed to fetch knowledge base items

confirm.title: Confirm Deletion
confirm.desc: Are you sure you want to delete this item?

feedback.title: AI Feedback Management
feedback.desc: Review user ratings and corrections to improve AI accuracy.
feedback.question: Question

promote_dialog.title: Promote to Knowledge Base
promote_dialog.desc: Refine the keyword and statement before saving to the knowledge base.

detail_dialog.title: Feedback Details
detail_dialog.desc: Full record of the AI interaction and user feedback.
detail_dialog.deleted_history: Original chat history was deleted. Showing captured response only.

third_party.title: Third Party Binding
third_party.unbound_wechat: Not bound to any WeChat account.
third_party.dialog_unbind_desc: Are you sure you want to unbind your WeChat account? You will no longer be able to use WeChat One-Click Login.

permissions.title: Permissions Management
permissions.desc: Manage granular system permissions and access controls.
permissions.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this permission?
permissions.name: Permission Name

ai_chat.greeting: Hello! I am your AI Copilot. How can I help you today?
ai_chat.error: Sorry, I encountered an error creating that query.
